0011010011001100 1111011001100011 1 -> sum: 0010101100110000, cout: 1
0100110111100110 0010000111010000 1 -> sum: 0110111110110111, cout: 0
1010010011000000 1101101001010101 1 -> sum: 0111111100010110, cout: 1
1110101010001111 0101111000010111 0 -> sum: 0100100010100110, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
